import React, { Component } from 'react'; import AwesomeSlider from 'react-awesome-slider'; import { MdAddShoppingCart } from 'react-icons/md' import { Container, ProductList, RegraLink } from '../home/styled' import { GiBarracks } from "react-icons/gi"; import { GoCloudDownload, GoCreditCard, GoBell, GoDeviceDesktop } from "react-icons/go"; import Hearder from '../../components/Header' class produtos extends Component { state = { products: [{ id: 1, name: "Gta 6 (Augustingo carraca Version)", price: 299.00, image: "https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/732363484347760751/734111584640827402/link-trad.png", description: "O melhor Jogo da Rockstar com o incrivel protagonista.." }, { id: 1, name: "Gta 6 (Augustingo carraca Version)", price: 299.00, image: "https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/732363484347760751/734111584640827402/link-trad.png", description: "O melhor Jogo da Rockstar com o incrivel protagonista.." }, { id: 1, name: "Gta 6 (Augustingo carraca Version)", price: 299.00, image: "https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/732363484347760751/734111584640827402/link-trad.png", description: "O melhor Jogo da Rockstar com o incrivel protagonista.." }, { id: 1, name: "Gta 6 (Augustingo carraca Version)", price: 299.00, image: "https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/732363484347760751/734111584640827402/link-trad.png", description: "O melhor Jogo da Rockstar com o incrivel protagonista.." }, { id: 1, name: "Gta 6 (Augustingo carraca Version)", price: 299.00, image: "https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/732363484347760751/734111584640827402/link-trad.png", description: "O melhor Jogo da Rockstar com o incrivel protagonista.." },], } render() { const { products } = this.state; return (
{products.map(products => (
  • {products.name} {products.description} {products.price}
    • ))}
    ) } } export default produtos;
